sub_topic: The chaotic dynamics of the Ikeda map
message_1:
What is the bifurcation parameter value at which the Ikeda map exhibits the transition from quasiperiodicity to chaos, given by the equation:

x[n+1] = 1 + a(x[n]cos(t[n]) - y[n]sin(t[n]))exp(-r[n])
y[n+1] = a(x[n]sin(t[n]) + y[n]cos(t[n]))exp(-r[n])

where a = 0.4, and t[n] = 0.4 - (6/(1+x[n]^2+y[n]^2)). Solve for the bifurcation parameter value analytically using mathematical methods.
